school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She\'s the only Calc teacher I\'ve had that was patient and able to explain things clearly.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Her tests are impossible. Most of the questions are not from the book or examples presented in lecture. I did not finish this course yet but the latest average for the second exam was a 40%. In my opinion, you would be safe choosing a different professor for Calculus 2 (152)

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: omg I can never decide which math professor at rutgers is the best, because of people like Professor Wolf. she is a very interesting person and also a very smart teacher. you will definitely enjoy her british-ness while learning about the fascinating world of probability, if you get into the right section.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Good teacher. Representative upper level math course. Difficult, but with effort, you can get it. She really wants us to do well and puts in effort to help. Plus it\'s pretty cool to be taught by a 20-something year old chick than an old, stuffy man who barely speaks English. The accent rocks, I can hear it in my sleep.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She\'s really nice and she really cares about teaching. Her tests are really hard, but the curve is very generous and the grading is very fair. (i.e A is like 77 and B+ is like 70 an so on)Take her.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: the tests are NOTHING like the homework!!

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She redefines the words "Beauty" and "Intelligence". One of the few women who are gifted with beauty and intelligence. However, she lacks compassion, especially, for non-math majors.
